title: Tile Panel Composed Of Six Square Tiles, 18th century
dimensions: H x W x D (Together): 25.5 x 38 cm (10 1/16 x 14 15/16 in.)
description: Vertical rectangle with urn and flowers in manganese violet on white ground. Shoulder of urn with pendant drapery and band of ellipses enclosing diagonal lines. Continuous vine-and-leaf border with oviform figures in the center.

type.name: Tile panel composed of six square tiles

tombstone.epitaph: Tile Panel Composed Of Six Square Tiles, 18th century. Tin-enamelled earthenware. 1937-68-1-a/f.
